name: Olecard
description:
Olecard, a board game for education about toleration made with Unity 2D, still made of Indonesian Language. English coming soon.

Olecard has the strength of the ease of playing and its unique design apart from the absence of challenges in the game and the threats that exist, wide open opportunities from the diversity of domestic culture and interesting new products.

Project still development, bug and error is expected, make issue or pull request in my github profile https://github.com/w1th0ut/olecard-board-game
